archdesc.runner: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle:
Papers of the Virginia Quarterly Review
1935-1954
did.physdesc: This collection consists of 60 linear feet.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of the Virginia Quarterly Review, Accession #RG-24/3/1.561, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was a gift of the editor on December 1956.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of editorial correspondence with contributors during the tenure of the following editors: Stringfellow Barr (1931-1937); Lambert Davis (1937-1938); Lawrence Lee (1938-1942); Archibald Bolling Shepperson (1942); and, Charlotte Kohler (1942-1974). Included are almost all of the literary figures of this period, and many from other fields. Authors' original manuscripts together with proofs of almost every article and book review published in the Virginia Quarterly Review during this period. Proofs and manuscripts are filed in a separate sequence, chronologically by date of publication. A slip list of proofs and manuscripts is available in Special Collections.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Correspondence is filed alphabetically. Proofs and manuscripts are individually foldered and filed in a separate sequence, chronologically by date of publication.

otherfindaid.head: Other Finding Aid
otherfindaid.p: A slip list of proofs and manuscripts is available in the Special Collections Department.
